name: How to connect your app with WalletConnect?
description: Improve your dapp by integrating WalletConnect with Web3Modal and allow your users to connect to Metamask, Rainbow, Trust Wallet and many more wallets. Including a short introduction to Ethereum libraries such as web3.js and ethers.js followed by a code walkthrough integrating a dapp with Web3Modal supporting WalletConnect. Finally we will cover best practices and UX improvements to really polish your dapp.
